description: The Pride of Barbados (Caesalpinia pulcherrima) is a striking plant that adds exuberance to any garden. Its vibrant flowers of yellow, orange and red will attract hummingbirds from afar. Not only is it beautiful, but it's also quite durable, tolerant of drought and well-drained soils. Its long, slender leaves provide a lush textural element, making it the perfect accent plant. The Pride of Barbados is perfect for a variety of landscapes, from borders to containers. Its versatility and hardiness make it a favorite among gardeners. Let the breathtaking beauty of the Pride of Barbados bring your garden to life.
